content.question: Capacitors of capacitance <math alttext="C sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> and <math alttext="C sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="C sub 1 is greater than C sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>, are connected in separate circuits to a <math alttext="12 volt" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> battery, identical resistors of resistance <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></math>, and a switch <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow></math>. The switch is closed, and the potential difference <math alttext="V sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="V sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> across the plates of capacitors <math alttext="C sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> and <math alttext="C sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>, respectively, is measured over equal intervals of time. Which of the following is a possible set of data for this setup?

choices.label:
Time <math alttext="in seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub 2, in volts" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>V</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
